attributes.title: This app didn’t perform well.
attributes.review: I tried using this app but as I opened it I was welcomed with disgusting nudes. I quickly closed the app. After I closed the app my phone had 420,690 viruses😭 I didn’t know what to do! I had to throw my phone away. Please apple remove this app! It doesn’t work and it’s disgusting!

attributes.title: Fake News And Has Terrible Glitches DELETE
attributes.review: This app is Inaccurate, Fake News, and Offensive to People Of Color. It Exits me out every 5 minutes after clicking, And Gives False Information that other platforms do not know about. Why is this even on the App Store???

attributes.title: i’m not sure......😔
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and i am shook there is whispers behind my ears i am super super shooked i am going to have to say no on this one i see notes on my wall why is this happening and the app is just haunting me idk if it’s the cheeto or the orange or the orange cheeto it will be said soon 🧚🏻‍♀️confidence is key🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️your locked out✨✨

attributes.title: Did not get free wall
attributes.review: I downloaded app expecting to get a new wall in my backyard later by mexico but was disappointed when nothing happened😡 it’s almost like the app lied abt everything and dehumanized and alienated minorities to get downloads and support from white supremacists and racists or something🖐🏽😒

attributes.title: Horrifying definitely do not recommend
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and about 3 seconds after my whole phone screen had a giant orange pig on it the pig was talking about himself and stating fake facts. I do not recommend this app because now my dreams are haunted and everyone in a 10 feet mile radius is scarred for life.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: I tried to give this 🧚🏼‍♀️orange cheeto🧚🏼‍♀️ man a chance by checking out this app. But unfortunately, I actually found a way to dislike him more. This app took days to download and put a VIRUS on my phone. Maybe Trump should stop worrying about Tik Tok hacking our phones and worry about the Trump app hacking our phones.

attributes.title: This app sucked ✨🧚
attributes.review: Ok so this app absolutely sucked not just because it's run by a baby man and a child but also he literally doesn't know how to run a country leave the office your not making America great again because it never was your making it worse 🥰❤️✨

attributes.title: Bad bad bad
attributes.review: After a WEEK of waiting for this to download once I did I immediately regretted it!! I started getting countless emails and phone calls from spam phone numbers!!!! And now my phone keeps crashing! Worst app I can’t believe it was even allowed on the App Store

attributes.title: Overrated
attributes.review: This app is super overrated and unnecessary. Trump has given us countless reasons as to why he shouldn’t be president such as being racist, raping 12-13 year olds, and etc. Also, this app has very low use. Do us all a favor and get rid of this app and TRUMP . Thank you and have WONDERFUL day (go download tiktok before it’s to late)

attributes.title: absolutely terrible
attributes.review: I noticed other people have the same problem of the app taking TWO WEEKS TO DOWNLOAD but when i opened the app the first thing i see is a rly graphic nasty picture😣😣😣 the 🧡orange with the brain of a 3 yr old🧡 created such a nasty app that has almost lead me to the point of suicide🤩✨
